blocks.title: Q59
blocks.text: I realize you've had a few questions since the, topic of methodology come up, and you haven't answered them. But I'm just curious as to your outlook on what is beyond meth methodology. Well, first of all, I think the important thing to realize is that no one should take my word for anything. If someone brings up a question which begins with, if there is no methodology, what they're saying is that they are that that I have posed something which they have not themselves realized, and they are waiting for me to provide an explanation against their belief with for which there is a methodology. I have no interest in doing that. I'm not I'm not interested in here having a discussion. One must filter everything that I say through themselves, through their own experiences. One becomes one's own greatest teacher. So this is not believing me. One must filter everything through themselves. Methodologies don't go anywhere, but you should listen to that. If you're a person who believes in methodologies, quite frankly, the most honest thing for you to do would be to pursue methodologies, never to abandon them to listen to me.

blocks.title: Q65
blocks.text: Hello. My wife passed away early of breast cancer at the age of 39. How do I begin with thank you. How how do I move on from death so I can start living life? I cannot tell you how to move on. There's no lessening of sorrow. There there really is, any attempt to make yourself feel better about it, will only exacerbate your pain.
blocks.audio_file: Select Questions Will Receive A Response_ Kapil Gupta MD Q&A on - 14 Sept 2021.mp3

blocks.title: Q66
blocks.text: Thank you very much. There is nothing to tell any human being that they should do this or they should do that. No human being should seek truth. No human being should not seek truth. Pursuing methods and techniques will lead someone nowhere, but no human being should listen to that either. It must coincide with their own experiences. All things must be filtered through one's own self. To listen to someone else in order to find the answer is to invite illusion. Human beings are fundamentally unhelpable. They will do what they will do. When someone is ready, they are ready. And when they are not, they are not. When a human being is ready for the truth, they will open themselves up to it. When they are not ready for the truth, they will seek prescription. This human life is an opportunity to discover truth. It's not a good thing. It is not a proper thing. No one should do it because there is no should. But in the end, the truth is the only thing there is. Good night.
